items.name: Breach Scarab
items.description: Area contains 2 additional Breaches

items.name: Breach Scarab of the Dreamer
items.description: Breaches in Area will always belong to Chayula

items.name: Breach Scarab of Lordship
items.description: Breaches in Area each contain a Breachlord

items.name: Breach Scarab of Splintering
items.description: Breach Monsters in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters Clasped Hands in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters

items.name: Breach Scarab of Snares
items.description: Breaches in Area have 3 to 5 additional Clasped Hands Clasped Hands in Area are guarded by a rare Breach Monster

items.name: Breach Scarab of Resonant Cascade
items.description: Breaches in Areas open and close 10% faster for each Breach already opened Monsters from Breaches in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for each Breach already opened

items.name: Cartography Scarab of Escalation
items.description: 10% increased Maps found in Area for each Map Modifier affecting Area

items.name: Cartography Scarab of Risk
items.description: Area has 2 additional random Modifiers

items.name: Cartography Scarab of Singularity
items.description: A Unique Map will drop from the Final Map Boss

items.name: Cartography Scarab of Corruption
items.description: Non-Unique Maps found in Area are Corrupted with 8 Modifiers

items.name: Cartography Scarab of the Multitude
items.description: Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of Difficult and Rewarding Monsters which drop 300% increased Maps

items.name: Titanic Scarab
items.description: Unique Monsters have 1% increased Toughness, Damage, Rarity and Quantity of items dropped per 1% increased Pack Size of Area

items.name: Titanic Scarab of Treasures
items.description: Unique Monsters in Area have an additional Reward Unique Monsters in Area have 30% increased Toughness

items.name: Titanic Scarab of Legend
items.description: Unique Monsters in Area have 2 additional Monster Modifiers

items.name: Bestiary Scarab
items.description: Area contains Einhar

items.name: Bestiary Scarab of the Herd
items.description: Area contains 5 additional Red Beasts if it contains Einhar

items.name: Bestiary Scarab of Duplicating
items.description: Create a copy of Beasts captured in Area

items.name: Bestiary Scarab of the Shadowed Crow
items.description: Area contains The Black MÃ³rrigan if it contains Einhar

items.name: Influencing Scarab of the Shaper
items.description: Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Area

items.name: Influencing Scarab of the Elder
items.description: Adds Elder Influence outcome to Area

items.name: Influencing Scarab of Hordes
items.description: Influenced Monster Packs in Area have 40% increased Pack Size

items.name: Influencing Scarab of Conversion
items.description: Tier 14+ Maps found in Area have a chance to drop as Shaper Guardian, Elder Guardian, Conqueror or Unique Synthesised Maps instead

items.name: Sulphite Scarab
items.description: Area contains Niko Map owner gains 150% more Sulphite

items.name: Sulphite Scarab of Greed
items.description: Map owner gains 150% more Sulphite

items.name: Sulphite Scarab of Fumes
items.description: Sulphite found in Map Area releases Enraging Fumes Monsters affected by Enraging Fumes have 50% increased Item Quantity Sulphite in your maps is guarded by Monsters from the Azurite Mine

items.name: Divination Scarab of The Cloister
items.description: Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of Doedre's Devoted Doedre's Devoted have 1% additional chance to drop a Stacked Deck

items.name: Divination Scarab of Plenty
items.description: Area contains 6 to 10 additional Packs of Divination Touched Magic Monsters that have 1000% increased chance to drop Divination Cards

items.name: Divination Scarab of Pilfering
items.description: Divination Cards which drop in Area are stolen by a Final Map Boss That Final Map Boss becomes more Difficult and deals increased Damage the more Divination Cards they have stolen That Final Map Boss duplicates all stolen Divination Cards when defeated

items.name: Torment Scarab
items.description: Area is haunted by 3 additional Tormented Spirits Tormented Spirits in Area have a 25% chance to be set free when Possessed Monsters are slain

items.name: Torment Scarab of Peculiarity
items.description: Tormented Spirits in Area are replaced with unusual variants

items.name: Torment Scarab of Release
items.description: Tormented Spirits in Area have a 25% chance to be set free when Possessed Monsters are slain

items.name: Torment Scarab of Possession
items.description: Rare Monsters in Area have a quarter chance to be Possessed by up to 1 Tormented Spirit

items.name: Ambush Scarab
items.description: Area contains 3 additional Strongboxes

items.name: Ambush Scarab of Hidden Compartments
items.description: 15% Chance for Strongboxes in Area to be openable again

items.name: Ambush Scarab of Potency
items.description: 75% Increased effect of Explicit Modifiers on Strongboxes in Area

items.name: Ambush Scarab of Containment
items.description: Area contains many additional Strongboxes Area's inhabitants are lying in ambush

items.name: Ambush Scarab of Discernment
items.description: Strongboxes in Area are more likely to be rarer varieties

items.name: Harbinger Scarab
items.description: Area contains 3 additional Harbingers

items.name: Harbinger Scarab of Obelisks
items.description: Harbingers in Area spawn Empowered Obelisks Empowered Obelisks drop Currency Shards when defeated

items.name: Harbinger Scarab of Regency
items.description: Harbingers in Area have a 50% chance to be replaced by a powerful Harbinger Boss

items.name: Harbinger Scarab of Warhoards
items.description: Currency shards dropped by Harbingers in Area are duplicated

items.name: Expedition Scarab
items.description: Area contains an Expedition Encounter

items.name: Expedition Scarab of Runefinding
items.description: Expedition Encounters in Area have 100% increased number of Runic Monster Markers

items.name: Expedition Scarab of Verisium Powder
items.description: Expedition Encounters in Area have 50% increased number of Explosives 80% increased Explosive Radius

items.name: Expedition Scarab of the Skald
items.description: Expedition Encounters in Area are lead by Dannig

items.name: Expedition Scarab of Archaeology
items.description: Remnants in Expedition Encounters in Area have 2 additional Suffixes and Prefixes

items.name: Legion Scarab
items.description: Area contains an additional Legion Encounter

items.name: Legion Scarab of Officers
items.description: Legion Factions in Area have 5 additional Sergeants

items.name: Legion Scarab of Command
items.description: Legion Factions in Area are accompanied by a General

items.name: Legion Scarab of The Sekhema
items.description: Legion Encounters in Area always contain the Maraketh Faction

items.name: Legion Scarab of Eternal Conflict
items.description: Legion Monsters in Area can be broken out of Stasis multiple times Legion Monsters in Area gain increased Difficulty and Reward for each time they are broken out

items.name: Abyss Scarab
items.description: Area contains an additional Abyss

items.name: Abyss Scarab of Multitudes
items.description: Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters

items.name: Abyss Scarab of Edifice
items.description: Abysses in Area that do not lead to an Abyssal Depths lead to a Stygian Spire Abysses in Area spawn Hoards as they travel

items.name: Abyss Scarab of Emptiness
items.description: Rare Abyss Monsters in Area have a 50% chance to drop an additional Rare item with an Abyssal socket

items.name: Abyss Scarab of Profound Depth
items.description: Monsters from Abysses in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for each prior Pit in that Abyss

items.name: Anarchy Scarab
items.description: Area contains 4 additional Rogue Exiles

items.name: Anarchy Scarab of Gigantification
items.description: Wild Rogue Exiles in Area have a 30% chance to be replaced with a Rogue Giant

items.name: Anarchy Scarab of Partnership
items.description: Wild Rogue Exiles in Area have a 50% chance to appear in pairs

items.name: Essence Scarab
items.description: Area contains 2 additional Imprisoned Monsters

items.name: Essence Scarab of Ascent
items.description: Essences found in Area are a tier higher

items.name: Essence Scarab of Stability
items.description: Using a Remnant of Corruption in Area can only result in upgrading or transforming Essences

items.name: Essence Scarab of Calcification
items.description: Rare monsters that are natural inhabitants of the Area are imprisoned by Essences

items.name: Essence Scarab of Adaptation
items.description: Imprisoned Monsters released in Areas grant a random Essence Modifier to another Imprisoned Monster in the Area Imprisoned Monsters in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for each Essence Modifier

items.name: Domination Scarab
items.description: Area contains 2 additional Shrines

items.name: Domination Scarab of Apparitions
items.description: Area contains 2 additional Apparition Shrines

items.name: Domination Scarab of Evolution
items.description: Area contains an additional Evolving Shrine

items.name: Domination Scarab of Terrors
items.description: Shrines in Area are guarded by an Atlas Boss Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses

items.name: Ritual Scarab of Selectiveness
items.description: Rerolling Favours at Ritual Altars in Area has no cost the first 2 times Ritual Altars in Area allow rerolling Favours 1 additional time

items.name: Ritual Scarab of Wisps
items.description: Ritual Altars in Area spawn a Wildwood Wisp Wildwood Wisps grant 100% increased Tribute Gained to nearby Players

items.name: Ritual Scarab of Abundance
items.description: Rituals in Area offer 100% increased Favours

items.name: Harvest Scarab
items.description: Area contains the Sacred Grove

items.name: Harvest Scarab of Doubling
items.description: Lifeforce dropped by Harvest Monsters in Area is duplicated Harvest Monsters in Area have 100% more Life

items.name: Harvest Scarab of Cornucopia
items.description: If Area contains the Sacred Grove, it will contain up to 1 additional Tier 4 seed of each type, if possible

items.name: Incursion Scarab
items.description: Area contains Alva

items.name: Incursion Scarab of Invasion
items.description: Area contains 12 to 16 additional packs of Incursion Monsters

items.name: Incursion Scarab of Champions
items.description: Incursions in Area have a 35% chance for all Monsters to be at least Magic Incursions in Area have 15% increased Pack Size

items.name: Incursion Scarab of Timelines
items.description: Final Architect slain in Area will drop an Itemised Temple Itemised Temples dropped in Area are generated based on current Temple layout, but with randomised room tiers

items.name: Betrayal Scarab
items.description: Area contains Jun

items.name: Betrayal Scarab of the Allflame
items.description: 75% Increased number of Monster Packs Substituted by Allflame Embers in Area

items.name: Betrayal Scarab of Reinforcements
items.description: Immortal Syndicate Members in Area have 50% increased chance to be accompanied by reinforcements

items.name: Betrayal Scarab of Perpetuation
items.description: Defeated Immortal Syndicate targets in Area have a 50% chance to drop an additional Scarab

items.name: Beyond Scarab
items.description: Slaying enemies close together in Area can attract monsters from Beyond this realm

items.name: Beyond Scarab of Corruption
items.description: Items dropped by Beyond Demons in Area are Corrupted

items.name: Beyond Scarab of Haemophilia
items.description: Beyond Portals in Area have 50% increased Merging Radius

items.name: Beyond Scarab of Resurgence
items.description: Beyond Bosses in Area are enraged on low life Beyond Bosses in Area drop 100% increased Tainted Currency Beyond Portals in Area have 30% increased chance to spawn a Unique Boss

items.name: Beyond Scarab of the Invasion
items.description: Rare and Unique Monsters slain in Area create 8 to 12 additional Beyond Portals

items.name: Ultimatum Scarab
items.description: Area contains an Ultimatum Encounter

items.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Bribing
items.description: Ultimatum Monsters grant 150% increased Experience Ultimatum Encounters grant rewards as though you completed 2 additional Rounds

items.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Dueling
items.description: Ultimatum Encounters in Area will always lead to a Unique Boss if possible

items.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Catalysing
items.description: Ultimatum Encounters in Area will only offer Catalysts as Rewards to the Map Owner

items.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Inscription
items.description: Ultimatum Encounter rewards in Area offering Catalysts will offer Inscribed Ultimatums to the Map Owner instead

items.name: Delirium Scarab
items.description: Area contains a Mirror of Delirium

items.name: Delirium Scarab of Mania
items.description: Delirium Reward Meters fill 100% faster in Area Delirium in Area increases 50% faster with distance from the mirror

items.name: Delirium Scarab of Paranoia
items.description: Delirium Encounters in Area generate 2 additional Reward types

items.name: Delirium Scarab of Neuroses
items.description: Delirium Encounters in Area contain all Unique Delirium Bosses Can only be used with Tier 11+ Maps

items.name: Delirium Scarab of Delusions
items.description: Maps found in Area have layers of Delirium

items.name: Blight Scarab
items.description: Area contains a Blight Encounter

items.name: Blight Scarab of Bounty
items.description: Blight Chests in Area have a 20% chance to be openable again

items.name: Blight Scarab of the Blightheart
items.description: Blight Encounters in Area have one Blighted Chest Blight Encounters in Area spawn many more waves of Enemies Blighted Chests in Area grow larger and more rewarding the more Blighted Enemies are slain

items.name: Blight Scarab of Blooming
items.description: Blight Encounters in Area have up to 3 additional Unique Bosses Unique enemies in Blight Encounters have 100% increased life Tier 14+ Blighted Maps found in Area drop as Blight-Ravaged Maps instead

items.name: Blight Scarab of Invigoration
items.description: Each Empowering Tower in Areas grants Blighted Monsters in range increased Difficulty and Reward

items.name: Kalguuran Scarab
items.description: Area contains an additional Ore Deposit

items.name: Kalguuran Scarab of Guarded Riches
items.description: Monsters guarding Ore Deposits in Area are at least Magic

items.name: Kalguuran Scarab of Refinement
items.description: Ore Deposits in Area grant Smelted Bars instead of Marking Ore

items.name: Scarab of Monstrous Lineage
items.description: 40% increased Magic Pack Size

items.name: Scarab of Adversaries
items.description: Area contains 4 additional Packs with Mirrored Rare Monsters

items.name: Scarab of Divinity
items.description: Up to 2 additional Rare Monsters in Area will be Pantheon-Touched Apparitions spawned by Pantheon-Touched Monsters deal 100% increased damage

items.name: Scarab of Hunted Traitors
items.description: Area contains Hunted Traitors

items.name: Scarab of Stability
items.description: Portals to Area have a 50% chance to not be consumed on use

items.name: Scarab of the Commander
items.description: Grants an additional Kirac Mission on Map Completion

items.name: Scarab of Evolution
items.description: 10 Monster Packs in Area are upgraded to Magic

items.name: Scarab of Wisps
items.description: Monsters in Area have a chance to be Empowered by 2000 Wildwood Wisps

items.name: Scarab of Bisection
items.description: You can select the Nullify Prefixes or Nullify Suffixes crafting options on the Map Device

items.name: Scarab of Unity
items.description: All Magic Monsters in Area are in a Union of Souls Monsters in Area get 1% more Rarity of items dropped for each Empowered Soul, up to 500%

items.name: Scarab of Radiant Storms
items.description: Area contains a Resplendent Tempest

items.name: Horned Scarab of Bloodlines
items.description: Area has 150% increased Magic Monsters

items.name: Horned Scarab of Nemeses
items.description: Rare Monsters in Area have 2 additional Modifiers

items.name: Horned Scarab of Preservation
items.description: Other Scarabs are not consumed on use

items.name: Horned Scarab of Awakening
items.description: You can select one Imbued crafting option on the Map Device

items.name: Horned Scarab of Tradition
items.description: All Rare and Unique Monsters in Area have dropped items transformed by a Reward Modifier

items.name: Horned Scarab of Glittering
items.description: Players in Area gain increased Item Rarity for each Monster slain, up to 400%, decaying over time

items.name: Horned Scarab of Pandemonium
items.description: Monster packs in Area have a 15% chance to be replaced by a random Atlas Boss Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses
